# alpine tag

Add or remove tags from an instance.

```
alpine tag [-r] <instance> <tag1> [<tag2>...]
```

## Description

Add or remove tags from an instance.

## Options

```
  -h, --help     help for tag
  -r, --remove   Remove tag(s) rather than add them.
```
